pages.text: The matter fabricator doesn't need to be the first tier 3 machine to be crafted, but that is recommended, because iridium is so rare. Hopefully you found 8 raw iridium by now. If not, put hearts of the sea into the industrial grinder.
You can get industrial circuits with the assembly machine by combining an advanced one with a platinum plate.
The 2 ingots you make need to be put into the implosion compressor to be formed to plates.
The most expensive ingredient for the fabricator: used 17 diamonds + 4 iridium + a lot of platinum dust.
Put scrap or scrap boxes into it to get uu-matter. Some recipes for uu-matter are given on the following pages.
